Package de.unlixx.runpng.scene

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CenteringScrollPane
    Implementation based on a ScrollPane as a main view.
    CheckerboardCanvas
    Implementation of a CheckerboardCanvas as a background for transparent images.
    DualUseImageButton
    Implementation of a DualUseImageButton.
    DualUseMenuItem
    Implementation of a DualUseMenuItem.
    FadeOutProgressBar
    This class implements an extension of the ProgressBar class for the sake of changing the color of the gauge.
    FramePane
    The FramePane class is a container for a frame image which it shows in an embedded ThumbnailView.
    FramesBox
    Implementation of a FramesBox to show a sequence of FramePane objects.
    FramesBox.DragContext
    Container for drag related data.
    ImageCanvas
    Scaling ImageCanvas for the CenteringScrollPane of the application.
    SliderEvent
    The SliderEvent transports a double value and a commit flag.
    Spacer
    Handy little spacer class to keep things in GUI appart.
    ThumbnailView
    Implementation of a ThumbnailView with multiple levels.
